file_content.text: Slogging through the forest to hunt you down was going to be the worst part of this job. It's so much easier when the targets come to us.
You must know who we are. Do you really think you can beat us?
You really want to try us?
The GenoHaradan fear no one. Not even you.
This doesn't need to end with violence.
We have no quarrel with you.
You're going to pay for your employer's mistake.
Good luck. The GenoHaradan don't go down easy.
The GenoHaradan? I thought you were just a myth.
That's because we never leave witnesses.
